sentences: Ma olen äris nädalavahetusest peale olnud.
context: The Estonian word 'äri' means business, commerce, or trade. It is used to refer to commercial activities, enterprises, or the act of doing business. The word can be used in various contexts such as talking about one's own business activities ('olen äris olnud' - I have been in business), evaluating a company's performance ('teeb head äri' - does good business), or simply referring to business in general.
